REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1435 reute r f BC-TIME-<TL>-TO-SELL-PAR 04-09 0051

TEXT.TITLE: TIME <TL> TO SELL PART OF UNIT
TEXT.BODY: Time Inc said its Time-Life Video Inc subsidiary has agreed in principle to sell its institutional training business to Time-Life Video president William V. Ambrose for undisclosed terms. It said the business will operate as Ambrose Video Publishing. Reuter
